programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep28
programme.desc: Crash Course - When a dangerous subterranean Cavern Crasher dragon invades the Fireworm Queen's underground nest, she approaches the Riders on Dragon's Edge for help.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep28
programme.desc: Big Busyness / Foam Party - When Leaf meets an ambitious Coffee Bean, he learns the highs and lows of business. / Everyone is mad at Rocksy so she tries to make it up to them by creating fun foam for them to play in. But when they get preoccupied and forget about Rocksy, its her turn to become mad at them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep28
programme.desc: Sullen Earth - When the Mole King kidnaps Uli, Puss realizes that confidence alone isn't always enough ammunition to defeat a powerful army

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep97
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy's Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Olivia Ep9
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia Ep10
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Olivia Ep11
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the arms of the law.

programme.title: Olivia Ep12
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel which isn't all it's cracked up to be and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock but the damage has been done. Eagle Mama Hen's best friend decides to lend Hen her most prized possession A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep73
programme.desc: Like A Fox - Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep21
programme.desc: It's On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Moving Train Tracks - Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the train tracks were moved by Fairy Coco who was tired to having to do all the work for Queen Sparklewings. If no one came to the picnic at all, there'd be no tidying up to do. Fairy Coco tells the Queen that she's very sorry for causing a mess and the Queen tells her that she's sorry too. She didn't mean to make the Fairies do all the work and miss out on the fun! Later, the picnic takes place and everyone helps clear up afterwards. It's much quicker and much more fun if everyone helps out together! Good job Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The King Of Toyland - Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is. Pat-Pat doesn't but following the clue of a cut out crown shape in orange card and using his investigative skills Noddy works out that Cloppycorn is the King of Toyland. He was fed up being bossed around by Hoof and Bling so decided to be king for the day with a little help from Queen Sparklewings. Bling and Hoof are sorry for upsetting Noddy and everyone is friends again in time for the Royal Ball! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep47
programme.desc: Primetime Wendi Powers / A Giant Problem - When Archibald accidentally becomes Wendi Powers camera operator, they team up to crack the story on Crackridges serial prankster. / While Archibald is babysitting, toddler Lola gets her hands on the Sizematron and accidentally bigifies herself to the size of a building!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt/Deer Ball - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire - Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new super trike. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.desc: The Secret Room / Little Shrimp, Big Problems - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together. // The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Return to Merlandia - The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdingers Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep403

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele - Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Capn Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Game Over/Forever Young - Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treats / Pups Get a Lift - Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Way of the Gran-Gran - Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Little Shrimp, Big Problems - The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sniffle / Pups and the Ghost Cabin - A sick day for the PAW Patrol? While Rubble and Ryder search for Farmer Al's runaway pigs, Marshall cares for his sniffly pup pals! // First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep413
programme.desc: The Summer Camp Games - Summer is here! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies celebrate the season with lots of outdoor fun. Gil uses his summer camping skills to rescue Bubble Puppy during the Summer Camp Games!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Three King's Day - It's Three Kings Day and Larimar is abuzz with holiday cheer! But when Bonnie Bones kidnaps a camel belonging to one of the Three Kings, it's up to Santiago and his crew to stop Bonnie from ruining the holiday.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Race / Pups Save an Outlaw's Loot - Its the annual Mayors Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet. // When Ryder comes across a map for buried treasure, Mayor Humdinger snatches the map and runs off to find the loot for himself.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Castle Badge - The squirrels hear an echo-ey voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower. Who is making all that noise?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Show And Tell Badge - Duggee has something really interesting to show at the clubhouse. Can the Squirrels find some other interesting things to share?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Rocking Horse Badge - Duggee introduces the squirrels to Bucky his old rocking horse. Saddle up, squirrels!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tower Bridge, London - Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Tepui Mountains, Venezuela - Xuli and Glitch need rescuing from a sinkhole.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Trees - Kit and Pup are walking in a forest. They are looking for a tree that matches a picture in their book, but they soon find that not all trees look the same.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: Shark - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shark' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of sharks! There's a pointy nosed shark and a big fin shark, a speedy shark and a grey and white shark.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Crazy Golf - Laa-Laa shows Tinky Winky how to play crazy golf. Tinky Winky loves hitting the ball which travels up and down the hills of Teletubbyland and in to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Silly Things - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Block - A strange robot block lands on the Clangers Planet. It takes soil samples and produces a plan. It soon becomes clear it is looking for a place to build new tower blocks.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep36
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Other Things - Gwen Tony and Bob encounter a Dinopaw called Dot who loves playing 'let's pretend'.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Leaning Tower of Tinpo Town - A building doesn't want to stand up straight and the Po can't live with slanting floors.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Wet Paint - Tinpo discovers a way to get around the wet floor in the garage to retrieve the newly painted Vehi-Tools before it rains.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Techno Monty - Monty wonders why some people like Jeanie prefer playing a game against the computer rather than playing in real-life with friends.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Ugli Fruit - Monty and Stan refuse to taste a strange-looking fruit, but Monty soon realises that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep10
programme.desc: It's Time to Run a Marathon - JoJo's worried she will be joining Jared on his marathon until she realises she's just going to support him! JoJo learns that being a supporter is almost as important as being a runner.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Sunset Picnic - Nelly and Nora want to enjoy a sunset picnic, but the annoying midges just won't leave them alone.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Bug Bop - Bug and his friends lead Sarah & Duck to their outdoor music concert.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Duck Flies - Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep20
programme.desc: Merry Misty Island - Dash, Bash and Ferdinand decide to throw a Christmas party.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep1
programme.desc: Gordon and Ferdinand - The Fat Controller gives Ferdinand the honour of helping Gordon take the Lion of Sodor to the summerhouse. Gordon, however, gets very jealous, which causes a nasty accident on the track.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Muffin Cone - When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Trouble Bubbles - Supertato and Evil Pea get stuck inside a giant bubble together. They float through the air until Supertato and Evil Pea pop the bubble by driving it into a supermarket sign.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Get Well Soon Badge - Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Hiccup Badge - The Squirrels meet a little worm who has swallowed a bit too much earth and has got the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Maze Badge - Duggee's workshop needs cleaning, so the squirrels try to help him - but they end up building a maze around Duggee!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Biogas Power - Greener fuel spells trouble for Glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Valley Of The Balls, Kazakhstan - Can the Go Jetters take control of a rocky situation in the Valley of Balls?

programme.title: My World Kitchen S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Scarlet's French Vegetarian Ratatouille - Scarlet is cooking a colourful French Vegetarian Ratatouille full of lovely fresh vegetables. She serves it with French bread and creates a beautiful table setting.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep15

programme.title: Swashbuckle S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Super Cannon - Captain Sinker orders a super-cannon to be delivered to the shipwreck, but it's smaller than she hoped it would be.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Handstand - At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna can't find a way to make herself useful. They're both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.desc: Wonder Pea - Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick but it's all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the Cobs needs help.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep26
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News Ep61
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep29
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel cover the latest from the FIFA Women's World Cup, preview the Matildas v Canada, Fifth Ashes Test at The Oval, World Swimming Championships, Bledisloe Cup, AFL, NRL, NRLW and Netball World Cup.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 20 - Richmond v Melbourne Ep117
programme.desc: The Premiers from 2017, 2019 and 2020 Richmond take on 2021 Premiers Melbourne in Round 20. The Tigers are one of 14 teams fighting for a top 8 spot while the Demons are battling Brisbane and Geelong for a spot in the top 4.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep61
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup - Matildas Alumni Ep12
programme.desc: The Matildas inspire generations of football stars and captivate the imagination of a nation, theirs is a legacy dating back to 1978. Tracey Holmes spoke to some Matildas alumni about what it means to wear the green and gold.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep61
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads - Great South West Walk, VIC Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Guest presenter Lisa Millar takes us on a journey along Victoria's spectacular Great South West Walk. Hiking the 250km trail is a chance to connect with nature but, as Lisa discovers, the experience can also be life changing.

programme.title: Our Law
programme.desc: At Western Australia's first Indigenous run Police Station, two Noongar officers must learn Yarnangu Lore and master the Ngaanyatjarra language, if they are to effectively police one of the most remote beats in the world.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After another heist by the Kelly Gang, Jay pieces together their identities and uncovers their hideout. Anousha finds an unexpected detail of the police investigation into Josh's death and suddenly finds herself in danger.

programme.title: The China Century - Unify The Motherland Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - China's return to imperial power after a century of humiliation.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Launceston TAS: The Gaffneys Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Tasmania is the backdrop for our latest episode, where presenter Jane Hall accompanies Sydney resident Frances on a tour of Launceston's real estate market. Can Frances find what her heart desires?

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Lindy Chamberlain Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Anh is joined by Lindy Chamberlain. Her wrongful conviction for the death of her daughter Azaria in 1980, taken by a dingo from their campsite, is etched into our national psyche. Can Anh capture her strength and humanity?

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep61
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Landline Ep25
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep61
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Insiders Ep25
programme.desc: From the heart of our democracy, the seat of power in Canberra, David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, bringing together a panel of the best political analysts and commentators to review the week.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep29
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel cover the latest from the FIFA Women's World Cup, preview the Matildas v Canada, Fifth Ashes Test at The Oval, World Swimming Championships, Bledisloe Cup, AFL, NRL, NRLW and Netball World Cup.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Brilliant Canvas - John Olsen Ep14
programme.desc: A story of art, fame and family. The late John Olsen, one of our most beloved painters, had an obsessive focus on his work, often casting a shadow on those around him. John and family open up about art and the cost of fame.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep26
programme.desc: Could Australia be heading into a recession under the weight of aggressive interest rate rises from the Reserve Bank? All eyes will be on the RBA's August rates decision to see how it deals with inflation and slowing growth.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep28
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents a weekly roundup of stories filed by the ABC's international correspondents posted across the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India, Indonesia and more.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep26
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep25
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep151
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep151
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep151
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Reptile Realm Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - There's more to Australia's reptiles than being cold-blooded killers. Aaron Pedersen explores intimate mating rituals and protective mothers as we scratch beneath the scales of our reptiles.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep12

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 291: Poirier vs. Gaethje 2
programme.desc: Main Event - The BMF title is up for grabs in the main event of UFC 291 on July 29, as Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje meet in a highly anticipated rematch at Delta Center in Utah where fireworks are not just expected, but mandatory when two of the best 155-pounders of this era collide. Plus, former champions meet when Alex Pereira makes his light heavyweight debut in a compelling matchup against the owner of Polish Power, Jan Blachowicz

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Heavyweights - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep25
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Grappler vs Grappler - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2320
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2320
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov
